seniority_level.evidence: 1+ years experience required with focus on practical AI model integration, suggesting mid-level role rather than senior or junior

job_family.evidence: Title is 'AI Data Engineer' with core responsibilities around data pipelines, model deployment, and API integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on preparing data for AI/ML models, deploying and monitoring models on Azure, integrating model APIs

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role reports to AI Tech Lead, collaborates with senior AI developer, no mention of managing people or leading teams

primary_cloud.evidence: Explicitly mentions Azure services, Azure ML, Microsoft Fabric, Azure DevOps, and deploying models on Microsoft Azure

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on preparing data for model training and automating workflows suggests batch processing, no streaming technologies mentioned

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure DevOps mentioned for automation, which is Azure's cloud-native orchestration tool

storage_layer.evidence: Microsoft Fabric mentioned (which supports both lake and warehouse patterns) and data preparation for AI models suggests mixed storage needs

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Prague, Czechia with hybrid work model, implying need to be in the region for office days

timezone_focus.evidence: Based in Prague, Czechia, which is in European timezone, and no mention of global team or other timezones

relocation_required.evidence: Location specified as Prague with hybrid work model, suggesting need to be based there (though not explicitly stated as 'must relocate')

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship, and location is in Czechia (not US), making H1B irrelevant

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visas or OPT/CPT, and location is in Czechia (not US), making OPT/CPT irrelevant

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement mentioned, but location in Czechia implies need for work authorization in Czechia

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with benefits like pension insurance, suggesting employee status (W2 equivalent in Czechia)

benefits_level.evidence: Multiple benefits mentioned including 5 weeks vacation, meal allowance, multisport card, pension, insurance, loans, events, and learning budget

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'focus on your development', 'internal & external trainings', 'boost your potential and independence', but no specific career tracks

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions collaborating with senior AI developer and being part of AI Competence Center under AI Tech Lead, suggesting mentorship opportunities

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions or advancement paths in the job posting

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or lateral moves in the job posting

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, etc.) mentioned, only general development opportunities

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills listed (Python, SQL, Azure, etc.) with no nice-to-haves, suggesting moderate strictness

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on AI data engineering with specific responsibilities around data preparation, model deployment, and API integration

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements (1+ years, Python/SQL/Azure, AI model experience) are reasonable for a mid-level AI Data Engineer role
